title: Design for irrigation: reconstructure of the home farm. Pt 1
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Planting (Plant culture)
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Water use
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Irrigation water
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Water in agriculture
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Efficiency in farming
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Irrigation farming - Australia
description: Shows that a proper plan of irrigation is essential when planting new orchards. The example in the film is a new block of slightly sloping land which is to be planted with fruit trees. A model of the block shows the contours, and the method of ploughing, irrigating and planting which should be carried out in relation to the contour lines.
